t: Amazon.com: Truly Scrumptious Heidi Klum 41 Lifetime Crib Mist : Everything Else
s: Is it just because Heidi Klum's name is on it? Because I could care less about that. I was so excited to get this crib and to spend all this money is super disappointing. Taking the crib apart, packing it up, taking it back to the store and waiting for another one that might also be defective sounds like a nightmare. What other options do I have?
